events.name: Brighton & Hove Albion at Tottenham Hotspur

headlines.description: An 89th-minute goal from Leandro Trossard handed Brighton a 1-0 victory against Tottenham Hotspur at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs UCL hopes hit after loss vs. Brighton

headlines.description: Manchester United needed a Cristiano Ronaldo hat trick to see off bottom-club Norwich City in a rollercoaster 3-2 win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ronaldo hat trick sees Man United beat Norwich

headlines.description: Jan Bednarek's first-half strike helped Southampton to a 1-0 victory against Arsenal at St. Mary's Stadium on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Forster shines as Southampton beat Arsenal

headlines.description: Brentford defender Pontus Jansson scored in added time as they secured a 2-1 Premier League victory over Watford at Vicarage Road on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jansson scores late as Brentford beat Watford
